## Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are checked before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No console.log or debugging statements left
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined (no `any` types)
- [ ] Error handling is implemented

### Testing
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] E2E tests pass locally (if applicable)
- [ ] Test coverage meets project standards (≥80% for web, ≥70% for mobile)
- [ ] Edge cases are tested

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Inline code comments added for complex logic

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data (passwords, API keys, secrets) committed
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] XSS prevention measures in place
- [ ] CSRF protection implemented (if applicable)
- [ ] SQL injection prevention (if applicable)

### Performance
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders (React)
- [ ] Database queries optimized
- [ ] Images optimized
- [ ] Lazy loading implemented where appropriate

### Accessibility
- [ ] Semantic HTML used
- [ ] ARIA labels added where needed
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader compatible

### Mobile (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on iOS
- [ ] Tested on Android
- [ ] Responsive design verified
- [ ] Touch targets are appropriately sized
